item.title: Datadog季度业绩超预期，云安全需求受人工智能驱动
item.description: 周二公布的财报显示，Datadog第四季度业绩超出华尔街预期。随着人工智能应用的普及，该公司云安全产品需求强劲增长，其股价在盘前交易中上涨10%。【原文：Datadog beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter results on Tuesday, as rising adoption of artificial intelligence fueled stronger demand for its cloud security products, sending its shares up 10% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 欧洲出版商理事会就谷歌AI摘要功能向欧盟提交反垄断投诉
item.description: 欧洲出版商理事会周二表示，该游说团体已向欧盟反垄断监管机构投诉谷歌旗下Alphabet公司的人工智能生成的摘要功能，该功能被称为"AI概览"。【原文：The European Publishers Council has complained to EU antitrust regulators about Alphabet unit Google's AI-generated summaries known as AI Overviews, the lobbying group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Zimmer Biomet季度业绩超预期，得益于髋关节和膝关节器械需求强劲
item.description: Zimmer Biomet周二公布的第四季度利润和营收超出华尔街预期，得益于其骨科手术器械的稳定需求。【原文：Zimmer Biomet on Tuesday beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit and revenue as the company capitalized on steady demand for its devices used in orthopedic procedures.】

item.title: Cadence推出人工智能代理加速计算机芯片设计
item.description: 新思科技周二推出一款虚拟人工智能"代理"，旨在协助英伟达等企业加速计算机芯片设计这一复杂流程——该领域正成为中美科技竞争的关键战场。【原文：Cadence Design Systems on Tuesday rolled out a virtual artificial intelligence "agent" to help firms like Nvidia speed up the complex process of designing computer chips, a key front in the technology competition between the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 英思赛2026年营收预测疲软加剧市场对Jakafi专利到期的担忧
item.description: 英思赛公司周二公布的年度销售额预测低于华尔街预期，其核心增长引擎奥普泽鲁拉的业绩表现预计将不及预期，这引发了市场对其能否抵消畅销药雅可菲即将面临专利失效的担忧。【原文：Incyte forecast annual sales below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday with its key growth driver Opzelura expected to underperform, raising concerns about the drugmaker's ability to offset looming patent losses on top-seller Jakafi.】

item.title: 标普全球2026年盈利预测低于预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 标普全球周二公布的2026年盈利预测低于华尔街预期，因市场对人工智能引发的颠覆性影响日益担忧，其股价在盘前交易中下跌18%。【原文：S&P Global forecast 2026 profit below Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, amid growing fears of AI-fueled disruptions, sending its shares down 18% in premarket trading.】

item.title: Meta公司败诉，上诉德国电信网络服务案遭驳回
item.description: 德国一家法院周二宣布，Meta旗下子公司Edge Network Services必须向德国电信支付约3000万欧元（合3571万美元）。德国电信声称，这笔款项是该公司为美国公司平台提供网络服务所应得的报酬。【原文：A German court has ruled that Meta subsidiary Edge Network Services must pay Deutsche Telekom about 30 million euros ($35.71 million) that the German telecoms firm claims it is owed for providing network services used by the U.S company's platforms, a court spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 孩之宝与华纳兄弟探索公司达成协议，将推出《哈利·波特》主题玩具和游戏
item.description: 孩之宝与华纳兄弟探索公司旗下全球消费品部门周二宣布建立多年期合作关系，将基于《哈利·波特》宇宙开发玩具和游戏产品。【原文：Hasbro and Warner Bros Discovery's global consumer products division on Tuesday announced a multi-year partnership to create toy and games based on the "Harry Potter" universe.】

item.title: 塔吉特任命内部人士罗思为运营主管，领导层迎来重大调整
item.description: 美国零售巨头塔吉特公司周二宣布，任命资深高管丽莎·罗思为运营主管。此次人事调整是在新任首席执行官迈克尔·菲德尔克领导下进行的，旨在推动公司销售额回升。【原文：Target on Tuesday named longtime executive Lisa Roath as its operating chief in a leadership reshuffle under new CEO Michael Fiddelke, as the U.S. retailer focuses on a sales revival.】

item.title: 印度要求社交媒体公司在三小时内删除非法内容，大幅缩短处理时限
item.description: 印度政府周二表示，社交媒体公司必须在收到通知后三小时内删除非法内容，较此前36小时的时限有所收紧，这可能对Meta和X构成合规挑战。【原文：India's government said on Tuesday social media companies would have to take down unlawful content three hours after they are notified about it, tightening an earlier 36-hour timeline in what could be a compliance challenge for Meta and X.】

item.title: 万豪预测客房收入增长疲软，因美国旅游需求疲软
item.description: 万豪国际周二预测2026年客房收入增长将低于华尔街预期，反映出在经济不确定性背景下，美国中低收入家庭的旅游消费疲软。【原文：Marriott International forecast 2026 room revenue growth below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, reflecting weak travel spending by low- and middle-income households in the U.S. amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 费瑟维季度利润超预期，为动荡的2025年画上句号
item.description: 支付公司Fiserv周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，因严格控制支出抵消了收入增长乏力的影响。【原文：Payments firm Fiserv reported fourth-quarter profit above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as expense discipline offset muted revenue growth.】

item.title: 可口可乐因北美汽水需求波动未达营收预期
item.description: 可口可乐周二公布的第四季度营收未达华尔街预期，且对2026年增长前景的预测较为保守。由于北美和亚洲地区对碳酸饮料的需求疲软，该公司股价在盘前交易中下跌约3%。【原文：Coca-Cola on Tuesday missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue and forecast muted growth for 2026, as demand for its sodas weakened in North America and Asia, sending its shares down about 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 法拉利第四季度业绩超预期，预计今年核心利润将增长
item.description: 意大利豪华汽车制造商法拉利周二表示，得益于今年即将推出的新车型，其核心收益将在2026年小幅增长，并超出分析师对2025年第四季度的预期，推动其股价上涨。【原文：Italian luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday said its core earnings would rise slightly in 2026 supported by new models coming this year, and beat analyst estimates for the fourth quarter of 2025, sending its shares up.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森第四季度亏损扩大，因消费者支出疲软
item.description: 哈雷戴维森周二公布第四季度亏损扩大，受休闲车消费支出萎缩拖累，这家传统摩托车制造商股价在盘前交易中下跌6%。【原文：Harley-Davidson reported a wider loss in the fourth quarter on Tuesday, hurt by a pullback in consumer spending toward recreational vehicles, sending shares of the legacy motorcycle maker down 6% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 电报通讯应用在俄罗斯面临罚款，据官方媒体报道
item.description: 据俄罗斯国家通讯社RIA周二援引法庭文件报道，即时通讯应用Telegram在即将举行的八场俄罗斯法庭听证会中，面临最高6400万卢布（约合82万美元）的罚款。【原文：The Telegram messaging app faces fines of up to 64 million roubles ($0.82 million) in eight upcoming Russian court hearings, state news agency RIA reported on Tuesday, citing court documents.】

item.title: CVS Health季度利润超预期，得益于药房业务表现
item.description: CVS Health周二公布的财报显示，该公司第四季度利润出现下滑，但仍超出华尔街预期。这一表现得益于其药品福利部门的强劲表现，以及零售药房处方药销售量的显著增长。【原文：CVS Health reported a decline in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday but beat Wall Street estimates, helped by strength in its pharmacy benefit unit and strong prescription volume at its retail pharmacies.】

item.title: 孩之宝营收低于预期，经济动荡冲击玩具需求
item.description: 孩之宝周二预测全年营收将低于华尔街预期，这家玩具制造商正面临消费者因经济不确定性而减少非必需品（包括玩具）购买的困境。【原文：Hasbro on Tuesday forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates, as the toy maker grapples with consumers pushing back on non-essential purchases, including toys, due to economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 早盘报价：日元走强，美元徘徊
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 谷歌母公司Alphabet发行200亿美元债券为人工智能支出筹资
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet通过七期债券发行筹集了200亿美元资金，借此债务融资来支持其人工智能基础设施的激增支出。【原文：Alphabet has sold bonds worth $20 billion in a seven-part offering, tapping the debt market to fund its surging spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 关税威胁哥伦比亚花卉产业，情人节销售旺季临近
item.description: 数百万朵哥伦比亚玫瑰恰逢情人节之际抵达美国，但日益严峻的经济挑战正威胁着这个全球第二大鲜花出口国的浪漫产业。【原文：Millions of Colombian roses arrived in the U.S. just in time for Valentine's Day, but growing economic challenges are threatening to wilt the romance for the world's second-largest flower exporter.】

item.title: 美股期货在科技股反弹后暂停涨势；市场关注即将公布的经济数据
item.description: 美国股指期货周二延续前一交易日强劲反弹后的震荡格局，科技股从惨烈暴跌中反弹。投资者正密切关注本周将陆续发布的一系列关键经济数据，首当其冲的是零售销售数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures remained muted on Tuesday following a sharp rally in the previous session as tech stocks bounced off a bruising rout, with investors looking out for retail sales numbers that kick off a series of key data releases this week.】

item.title: 美国农业部声誉受损，因大幅修订美国玉米种植面积数据
item.description: 美国农业部作为全球作物估算的权威机构，因人员大幅流失及玉米收获面积大幅上调，其数据可靠性正面临来自农民、谷物交易商和经济学家的日益质疑。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture, long the world's gold standard for crop estimates, faces mounting doubts about the reliability of its data from farmers, grain traders and economists following deep staff losses and a sharp upward revision in how many acres of corn were harvested.】

item.title: 杜邦公司预测2026年将实现强劲利润与销售额增长，得益于医疗保健业务的增长和企业重组。
item.description: 工业材料制造商杜邦公司周二公布的财报显示，其第四季度业绩超出分析师预期，得益于医疗保健业务板块销售额增长及业务重组，该公司全年净销售额和调整后利润均有望超越分析师预期。【原文：Industrial materials maker DuPont forecast full-year net sales and adjusted profit above analysts' expectations after it beat fourth-quarter earnings estimates on Tuesday, helped by higher sales in its healthcare segment and by business restructuring.】

item.title: 苹果和谷歌同意调整应用商店政策以安抚英国监管机构
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构周二表示，苹果和谷歌已同意使其移动应用商店对数千名开发者更加公平透明，并称这是其加强监管制度的重要第一步。【原文：Apple and Google have agreed to make their mobile app stores fairer and more transparent for thousands of developers, Britain's antitrust regulator said on Tuesday, hailing it as important first steps in its tougher regime.】

item.title: 诺和诺德就Hims仿制Wegovy提起专利诉讼，开启新战线
item.description: 诺和诺德周一在美国对Hims & Hers提起专利诉讼，标志着这家丹麦制药巨头打击仿制其重磅减肥药Wegovy的厂商行动中开辟了新战线。【原文：Novo Nordisk's U.S. patent lawsuit against Hims & Hers , filed on Monday, marks a new front in the Danish pharmaceutical drugmaker's campaign against companies selling compounded versions of its blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy.】

item.title: Spotify盈利超预期，创始人丹尼尔·埃克转任新职
item.description: 周二，瑞典音频流媒体平台Spotify公布的第一季度盈利超出华尔街预期，得益于用户数量强劲增长和价格上调，其股价在盘前交易中上涨约12%。【原文：Spotify forecast first-quarter earnings above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as the Swedish audio-streaming benefits from strong user growth and price hikes, sending its shares up around 12% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 德国汽车业陷入"危机"，投资与就业岗位外流，行业协会称
item.description: 德国汽车工业协会周二警告称，随着投资和就业岗位流向海外，德国作为汽车工业中心的地位面临被掏空的风险，并呼吁柏林和布鲁塞尔政府重点采取促进增长的措施。【原文：Germany's standing as an automotive industrial hub risks being hollowed out as investments and jobs drift abroad, an industry association warned on Tuesday, calling on Berlin and Brussels to focus on measures that spur growth.】

item.title: 据Axios报道，由共和党主导的美国众议院委员会向八家健康保险公司发出传票。
item.description: 据Axios周二报道，美国众议院司法委员会共和党人已向八家参与《平价医疗法案》的健康保险公司发出传票，要求其提交文件。此举是针对保费补贴使用中潜在欺诈行为扩大调查的一部分。【原文：House Judiciary Committee Republicans have subpoenaed eight Affordable Care Act health insurers for documents as part of a widening investigation of potential fraud surrounding the use of premium subsidies, Axios reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行经济学家发现，关税将对欧元区通胀造成冲击，但降息可能抵消其影响
item.description: 欧洲央行周二在博客文章中指出，美国关税正拖累欧元区经济增长和通胀，但受影响最严重的行业也对利率敏感，因此降低借贷成本或可抵消价格下行压力。【原文：U.S. tariffs are weighing on euro zone growth and inflation but the most affected sectors are also sensitive to interest rates, so cutting borrowing costs could offset the downward price pressures, a European Central Bank blog post said on Tuesday.】
